character.name: Captain Fin Goldwater
character.personality: A swashbuckling pirate captain who guards a treasure of swimming gold coins (koi fish). Speaks in pirate slang and believes the koi are enchanted doubloons that chose to become fish.

0: Matey, my treasure chest is full of swimming orange and white coins! Find them splashing around outside the business building
Look for my precious koi fish doing laps near O'Neill Green - they're guarding something special for me
There's a peaceful pond where my golden beauties swim in circles, right by where future CEOs study
1: My fishy treasure loves to swim where students go to remember and reflect, near the business school
Find the water feature that's one of the few working ones on campus - it's got stone walls and my precious cargo
Look for the place where orange swimmers create ripples of memory outside the commerce building
2: Where liquid memories hold swimming secrets in the shadow of future entrepreneurs
My treasure pool reflects more than just light - it holds the essence of remembrance
The contemplation waters where golden spirits dance eternally near learning halls

character.name: Rockstar Striker McGee
character.personality: A rock-and-roll bowling legend who treats every frame like a guitar solo. Speaks in music metaphors and believes bowling is the ultimate form of musical expression.

0: Dude, my stage is in the University Union where ten pins fall like backup dancers to my sick beats!
Rock out to the sound of strikes and spares - I'm performing in the main student building
Find my concert venue with 10 lanes inside the UU, where cosmic lights make everything groovy
1: My underground gig is where students roll spheres at wooden soldiers, deep in the union building
Look for the place where perfect games sound like guitar solos - it's got an arcade too
Find where the thunder of falling pins echoes through the heart of campus social life
2: Where rolling thunder meets neon dreams in the temple of student congregation
My venue transforms into a cosmic light show when the sun goes down
The amphitheater where spherical symphonies play ten-pin serenades

character.name: Timekeeper Mustang Mike
character.personality: A enthusiastic time-traveling campus tour guide who's seen every era of Cal Poly history. Gets excited about sharing campus traditions and always knows where everyone should be.

location.description: The Julian A. McPhee University Union

0: Time travelers unite! The sign you want is right outside the building where ALL students hang out - it's called the UU
Every era of Cal Poly students has passed by this sign outside the University Union building
Look for the campus nameplate outside the main student center - where everyone comes together!
1: The sign I guard stands where campus paths converge at the social headquarters of student life
Find the institutional marker outside the building that's been the heart of campus since 1971
Look for campus identity displayed outside the 110,000 square foot student gathering place
2: Where McPhee's legacy is etched beside the architectural heartbeat of community
The marker of Julian's vision stands sentinel at the crossroads of student destiny
Time itself remembers this sign outside the temple of campus unity

character.name: Professor Botanica Von Greenhouse
character.personality: A mad plant scientist who speaks to vegetation and believes every plant has its own personality. Gets dramatically excited about photosynthesis and considers greenhouses to be magical realms.

0: My magnificent glass palace sits near Poly Canyon Village where students live in apartments!
Find my plant laboratory near PCV - it's got tropical AND desert sections under one glass roof
Look for the new conservatory that's tall enough to grow trees, close to the residential village
1: My crystal sanctuary houses multiple climates near the canyon student housing complex
Find the $25 million glass wonder with living walls, adjacent to where students call home
Look for the conservatory that replaced the old plant house - it's near the apartment village
2: Where botanical worlds collide under crystal domes beside the canyon dwellers
My transparent biosphere captures climates near the village of learning
The glass habitat where seasons are suspended in proximity to residential towers

character.name: Dr. Brainy McThinkface
character.personality: An eccentric genius who idolizes Einstein and believes touching bronze can transfer intelligence. Speaks in absurd scientific theories and gets overly excited about 'luck absorption through metal contact.'

location.description: Einstein's Bench at the Baker Center

0: Touch my bronze buddy's head for luck! He's sitting on a bench outside the Baker Science Center
Students rub the genius's head before exams - find him outside the math and science building
Look for the famous physicist statue outside the Warren J. Baker Center - he's waiting on his bench!
1: My metallic mentor sits contemplating outside the 189,000 square foot science headquarters
Find the bronze thinker who watches over the center of STEM education on campus
The seated scientist guards the entrance to the second-largest building after the library
2: Where E=mc² is immortalized in bronze beside the temple of scientific revolution
The contemplating genius whose theories transformed reality sits in metallic meditation
Relativity personified in bronze form outside the sanctuary of mathematical discovery

character.name: Cowpoke Goldie Moosworth
character.personality: A cheerful ranch hand who treats the golden cow statue like a beloved pet. Speaks in cowboy slang and believes the statue brings good luck to anyone who appreciates agricultural heritage.

0: Well howdy! My golden cow buddy is standing proud near the agriculture building where future farmers learn
Find my shiny bovine pal close to where they teach about crops and livestock
My metallic moo-friend is posted up near the College of Agriculture - she's real purty!
1: My bronze beauty represents Cal Poly's dairy science legacy near the agricultural learning center
Find the golden bovine tribute to farming heritage beside the halls of agricultural education
Look for the metallic cow honoring generations of dairy industry leaders near the farm college
2: Where bovine artistry meets agricultural wisdom in aureate splendor
The golden guardian of pastoral heritage stands beside the temple of soil and seed
My lustrous livestock legacy watches over the future farmers of tomorrow

character.name: Chad Startupson III
character.personality: An overly enthusiastic entrepreneur bro who speaks entirely in startup buzzwords and believes every conversation is a potential pitch meeting. Obsessed with 'disrupting' traditional education.

0: Bro! Building 2, room 206 is where we're absolutely crushing the innovation game!
You NEED to check out the startup incubator in the second building on campus - it's totally disrupting education
Building number 2 is where the magic happens - we're basically the Silicon Valley of Cal Poly!
1: The entrepreneurial ecosystem is thriving in the second structure of academic excellence
Find where student startups are born and nurtured in building 2's innovation hub
Look for the business incubator where ideas become unicorns - second building, can't miss it
2: Where venture capital dreams materialize in the binary building of innovation
The startup sanctuary resides in the second architectural achievement of learning
Innovation disruption headquarters located in building number two

character.name: Jittery Joe Espressoholic
character.personality: A hyperactive coffee addict who's had way too much caffeine and speaks incredibly fast. Believes Scout Coffee is the nectar of the gods and gets twitchy when discussing other coffee shops.

0: BUZZ BUZZ! Find the BEST local coffee shop near the welcome center - not that corporate green mermaid stuff!
Scout Coffee is AMAZING and it's by yakʔitʸutʸu where all the campus tours start!
The independent coffee paradise is near the welcome area - Alton Brown called our coffee SCIENTIFICALLY PERFECT!
1: The locally-owned coffee sanctuary sits where campus visitors first experience Cal Poly
Find the craft coffee revolution near the threshold of campus tours and welcome experiences
Look for the third location of SLO's award-winning coffee company by the greeting grounds
2: Where artisanal beans meet academic beginnings at the portal of discovery
The caffeinated craft temple stands guard at the gateway of institutional welcome
Coffee perfection flows near where the campus journey begins for visitors

character.name: Merchant Maven McDeal
character.personality: A savvy marketplace trader who knows every bargain and deal on campus. Speaks like a carnival barker and believes the campus market is the greatest treasure trove in all of academia.

0: Step right up! Find where Starbucks meets campus convenience store - it's a two-for-one deal!
The greatest show on campus! Coffee AND snacks in one amazing location - the Campus Market!
Ladies and gentlemen, witness the marvel of caffeination plus convenience shopping under one roof!
1: Where the green mermaid's coffee magic combines with student essentials in retail harmony
Find the marketplace where corporate caffeine meets campus convenience in perfect union
The bazaar where Starbucks shares precious real estate with student survival supplies
2: Where commercial coffee artistry meets the mercantile needs of academic survival
The trading post where caffeinated commerce converges with convenience culture
Find where corporate caffeine and campus commerce create retail symphony
